profile:
The Grounds Guys is a full-service grounds care company. Our established systems allow us to deliver industry-leading lawn care and landscape solutions to commercial and residential clients. Built on a family tradition of caring, we are driven by a passion to exceed customer expectations and consistently deliver client satisfaction.
Keeping your yard in top shape can be physically exhausting, time-consuming, and expensive to manage on your own. Thatâ€™s why our expert landscapers in South Surrey are here to help! Our affordable, experienced lawn and yard care services make it easy to keep your yard looking picture perfect all year long. When you call The Grounds Guys of South Surrey, you can trust that we have the knowledge, skill, and equipment to properly care for your yard. Whether you need summer mowing, spring fertilization, fall leaf raking, or winter snow and ice management, our yard care professionals will be there for you.
Our Team Will C.A.R.E.:
Customers always come first: Your satisfaction is our top priority.
Attitude is key: So we make sure that ours is always positive.
Respect is a must: We treat you with the respect you deserve.
Enjoy life: Our job is to make the world a little more beautiful.
The Grounds Guys is a Neighbourly Company. Lawn care and landscaping are some of the many home maintenance solutions available to you through Neighbourly. At Neighbourly, we are committed to being there for all your home services needs.
services: Lawn and bed maintenance, Landscape and hardscape, weed control and fertilization, spring and fall cleanup, mulching, invasive species, pest control and management
specialities: Japanese knotweed, stem injections, and other invasive species management
name: The Grounds Guys of South Surrey

profile:
Harp Landscaping has been providing landscaping and gardening services for the last 21 years to the various property management companies and also private homes throughout various areas of the Lower Mainland. Our company is fully insured with WCB and liability insurance to protect our employees and clients. 

Services provided: 
* Strata and commercial maintenance      
* Grass cutting                                              *Soil and bark mulch 
* Gardening                                                
* Yard clean up                                              
* Pruning                                                        
* Hedge and shrubs trimming    
* Weed Control
* New lawn installation 
* Soil and bark mulch 
* Planting
* Aeration
* Power Rake
name: Harp's Landscaping & Lawn Service
